full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` LHA CHEN AOD HONG THENG GE RE LA RTEN 'BUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (AOD HONG THENG GE RE LA RTEN 'BUL GYI TSIG 'DI LTA BU CES KYANG DGOS ZHES DAD STOBS DANG LDAN PA DEM CHE DGE SLONG CING SU DZUG THU YANG YANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM MI HES KYANG BAG CHAGS BZHAG PA DANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR CHOS RJE'I MING CAN GYIS THA SHAL SU TI, KARMAS BLA MA GONG MA'I GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BRIS PA'I DGE BA'I SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA RKYEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
